description: A React functional component called SearchBar that provides a user interface for entering search queries for recipes. It manages internal state for the input text, updates it when the external value changes, and handles form submissions by invoking a callback.

methods.name: SearchBar({ value, onChange, loading })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a search form for recipes, managing input state and handling submissions.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles the form submit event, preventing default behavior and calling the onChange callback with the current input text.

ctags.name: SearchBar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function SearchBar({ value, onChange, loading }) {$/
